DOC.brief_summary: Aim study : The major aim evaluate effectiveness induction labor case fetal macrosomia reduction neonatal traumatism risk . The secondary aim evaluate maternal morbidity risk Caesarean case induction labor , compare spontaneous labor .
DOC.brief_title: DAME : Induction Labor Waiting Suspicion Fetal Macrosomia
DOC.detailed_description: A clinical trial multicentric randomize control organize . A total 1000 woman recruit 36 38 week amenorrhoea ( GW ) pregnancy single , cephalic presentation fetus estimate macrosomic gestational age ( > 90e percentile clinically > 95° percentile sonographically ) .All agree patient randomize one two follow group : - 1 . Induction labor 37+0 38+6 GW within 3 day randomization . - 2 . Expectancy spontaneous begin labor 41 GW.The measurement principal exit neonatal traumatism ( criterion composite associating : dystocia shoulder , fracture osseous , paralysis/paresis plexus brachial intracerebral haemorrhage ) .The secondary criterion neonatal asphyxiation ( arterial pH < 7.10 Apgar < 7 5 minute ) , maternal traumatism ( tear 3rd 4th degree ) Caesarean . The long-term after-effects mother child also evaluate
